summary: "Cannibal Holocaust" is a 1980 Italian movie about an anthropologist, Harold Monroe, who goes into the Amazon rainforest to find missing filmmakers. The movie, directed by Ruggero Deodato, shows graphic violence and was inspired by real-life events and "Mondo" documentaries. It caused a lot of controversy and was banned in several countries due to its violent and sexual content. Some people think the movie comments on journalism and cultural differences, but others don't agree. The film is still popular among fans of cult movies.
title: Cannibal Holocaust
